data.eml:eml: Nematomorpha from the Philippines, with description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt-Rhaesa, Andreas, Schwarz, Christian J. (2016): Nematomorpha from the Philippines, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4158 (2): 246-260, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4158.2.6
